metadata.description: The thinking reader’s Da Vinci Code… London, 1991. But not the London you may be familiar with. Imagine an England under Catholic rule – a rule so iron-fisted that science and technology have been set back decades. “Dan Petrou’s script is fluent and bold, in turns naturalistic and grandiose, with a rich range of characters interacting in almost Dickensian complexity. John Watkiss’ art is reminiscent of great illustrators of the past…” – Dave Gibbons, co-creator of Watchmen
metadata.name: Ring of Roses
